title: Charming Artistic Family Home in Kamienny Potok, Sopot
description: Discover this inviting 5-bedroom family house nestled in the vibrant Kamienny Potok neighborhood of Sopot. Spread over 174 sqm, the home balances creative inspiration and comfort, making it perfect for growing families and imaginative minds. The open-concept living and dining area is bathed in natural light, with a modern lighting system through the interiors. Enjoy seamless entertaining indoors and out, thanks to the spacious outdoor dining area connected to the lush, private garden.
neighborhood_description: Kamienny Potok radiates a community-focused spirit with a blend of artists, families, and locals cherishing its lively yet laid-back pace. Everyday amenities, artisan shops, and friendly cafés dot the neighborhood, fostering creativity and connection. With excellent public transport and flowing bike lines, exploring Sopot and coastal parks is both easy and enjoyable.
key_features: Family dining area with large windows
lifestyle_benefits: Ideal setting for creative families or artists seeking inspiration
Light-filled rooms perfect for both living and artistic pursuits
Friendly neighborhood atmosphere fosters community and creativity
Proximity to galleries, parks, and the sea encourages work-life balance
Safe environment for children to play, both indoors and outdoors
target_buyer: A family with artistic passions, creative professionals valuing space and a sense of community, or anyone longing for a lively yet relaxed place to nurture personal and artistic growth.
market_positioning: This property stands out in the Sopot market as a rare fusion of creative inspiration, family comfort, and a sought-after neighborhood known for its inviting community feel and balanced urban access. Offered at a highly competitive price for its size and features, it appeals especially to buyers seeking more than just a house—a home that nurtures both family life and creative dreams.
